_header: Mistress Barnarde gave her this book
_description: Prayer for the donor of the book, one woman to another — one couplet

HunHM136.Transcription:
Mystrys barnarde gave her thys bokeGod sende her well her ym to
                    loke
HunHM136.Note: Added to upper margin by a hand of sixteenth century.
HunHM136.Editions:
Hanna,  Ralph,
                        ed.  
             “The Index of Middle English Verse and Huntington Library Collections: A
                Checklist of Addenda.” 
             Publications of the Bibliographical Society of America
         74 (1980): 235-58: 249.
